definition: at an earlier place, appearing earlier in the same text, an earlier section of a written text
details:
adverb
- at an earlier place
= example: at an earlier place
= synonyms: supra
- in or to a place that is higher
= synonyms: higher up, in a higher place, to a higher place
adjective
- appearing earlier in the same text
= example: appearing earlier in the same text
noun
- an earlier section of a written text
= example: an earlier section of a written text
